about_the_game:
Project Volition is an upcoming psychological horror, inspired by the early 2000s and Internet culture.

STORY

Clara is an Internet shut-in. But when her world is invaded by the web, she must come out and face the code.

Invited by her friends to an abandoned computer company building in their small town, Clara is faced with strange visual hallucinations and whispers of ascension through the cyber. Find clues, talk to your friends, and explore the glitch-warped building in Project Volition.

FEATURES

Project Volition's demo currently features:
  • Three floors to explore
  • Detailed pixel art
  • A colorful cast of terminally online netizens
  • 20-25 minutes of gameplay

WHAT'S NEXT?

The full release of Project Volition aims to provide 5-6 hours of gameplay, as the player watches Clara's spiral into the flesh of the motherboard. New maps, new characters, and a new threat behind shades of red.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains frequent cursing, blood and gore, and pulsing images which may cause eyestrain.
